attributes.action: Protect Freedom Of The Press Now Free Speech Must Be Protected
attributes.additional_details: Protect Freedom Of The Press Now Free Speech Must Be Protected at all costs ! , the upset of a few must not allow us to remove the important tradition of free speech   something that safe guards us all and separates us from totalitarian run states all over the world. Men and Women sacrificed a lot to give us the right to freedoms we enjoy and any erosion of that is a bad thing , if people are wronged by the press they should take legal action of their own and not remove the right to free speech , the Press are a safeguard in a free society act now and sign t
